items.title: Wix Restaurants Request: Setting Up Abandoned Cart Reminders
items.description: Currently, it is not possible to set up an abandoned cart reminder in Wix Restaurants. This would allow automatic notifications to remind customers to complete their order.We are always working to upd...

items.title: Request: Connecting LiqPay as a Payment Provider
items.description: Currently, Wix does not offer LiqPay as a payment provider. If you use the Manual payment method, you can mention that you accept payments through LiqPay and arrange the payment offline.We are always ...

items.title: Wix Bookings Request: Allowing Single Tap Bookings on the Wix Mobile Apps
items.description: We are excited to announce that it is now possible for clients to book a class session with a single tap when using your Wix mobile apps (Spaces by Wix, Fit by Wix, or your own native mobile app).To e...

items.title: Wix Bookings Request: Displaying Past Sessions on the Agenda Widget in the Wix App
items.description: Currently, the agenda widget in the Wix app only shows upcoming sessions. Adding the ability to display past sessions on the widget would provide a more comprehensive view of your schedule.This featur...

items.title: Wix Stores Request: Connecting to CJ Affiliate Marketing Network
items.description: Currently, it's not possible to connect your Wix Store to CJ.com directly through the Wix dashboard, so that you can create shareable affiliate links for your products. We are always working to update...

items.title: Wix Bookings Request: Sending SMS Notifications While Managing Sessions in the Wix App
items.description: Currently, it is not possible to notify clients via SMS when scheduling, editing, or canceling a session from the Wix app. However, you can automatically send SMS reminders to members that they receiv...

items.title: Request: Ability to Refund Orders Processed through Additional Payment Providers
items.description: Important:This feature request is relevant for Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, and Wix Restaurants Orders (New).Currently, orders paid for through a few payment providers cannot be refunded in the Wix dashb...

items.title: Wix Audio Request: Hosting Your Podcasts at Wix
items.description: Currently, Wix does not have a feature which allows for hosting podcasts. We are always working to update and improve our products, and your feedback is greatly appreciated.Tip:You can link to your ex...

items.title: Wix Bookings Request: Enabling Video Conferencing from the Wix App
items.description: We are excited to announce that you can now enable video conferencing from the Wix app when creating or editing your appointments and classes.

items.title: Wix Stores Request: Letting Customers Select a Delivery Date from a Calendar
items.description: We're thrilled to announce that now, when you set up scheduled delivery, your customers can select their preferred delivery date from a calendar.
